newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: CAM director may be charged - state TV.
newsitem.headline: CAM director may be charged - state TV.

text.p: CAM International ex-managing director and chief executive Raymond Chew is likely to be charged in court on Saturday for criminal breach of trust, Singapore state television said in a report on Friday.
It quoted a spokesman from the Commercial Affairs Department (CAD) that Chew had been picked up by department officers on Friday.
The spokesman was quoted as saying Chew would be formally arrested later on Friday. CAD spokesmen were not immediately available to confirm the report.
Precision engineering based CAM International is at the centre of investigation by the CAD for alleged fraud.
Trading of the company's shares has been suspended.
